data.what_is: Mi8 helps companies generate and convert more leads into sales, and optimize marketing and sales ROI with 24/7 automated data management across all inbound and outbound channels.
data.product_description: The Mi8 Marketing Cloud platform makes it possible for marketers to listen to their customers needs and enables real one-to-one marketing communication.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Mi8 Marketing Cloud?
helps organizations to convert leads and customer data into more profit and long-term customer relationships in a comprehensible way. it helped out company in such a great deal, we were able to mentor the behavior of the current and prospective customers. this allowed us to know what to focus on and prioritize on customer personalized marketing

What do you dislike about Mi8 Marketing Cloud?
theres is nothing to dislike about this app, it is exceptional you will love it every step of the way

Recommendations to others considering Mi8 Marketing Cloud:
please go ahead and download it, it s so useful for marketig, you will have specific goals based on the analyisis of the app on what has worked for you before and what has not worked. you also get to see the loopholes of your marketing goals and bojectves and this allows you to know what to target on and what not to do in a specific period of time

What problems is Mi8 Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
marketing issues, we did not know which customers we were targeting and why but with the app, and trying out the A/B split test marketing whie suing the app, we were able to identify our strengths and the target audience. the sales improved and there were more lead generations and our website and facebook page were visited frequesntly because we knew thanks to this app where and whom to target for maximum benefits
